metadata.name: Pepeles and Nemean lion 1/12
metadata.description:
First of 12 : Nemean Lion

The first task was traveling to Nemea and slaying the Nemean Lion, a fierce beast terrorizing the countryside. This monster of a lion had a hide was so tough that no arrow could pierce it. Pepeles strangled it with his bare hands. Athena urged him to skin the lion, using the lion's own sharp claws. He wore the lion skin for the rest of his days.
